Henry Winkler is alive and not dead: as confirmed by his recent hosting of an acting workshop at the South by Southwest Festival in Austin, Texas on March 10, 2019.
The claim that Henry Winkler was a: huge Trump supporter" is false, as he has publicly expressed his disagreement with Scott Baio's political beliefs and has given financial support to Democratic candidates.
